title: Himi 1
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ke afe hoku ‘elelo
Pea u hiva ‘aki
‘A e ongoongo lelei
‘A hoku Huhu’i.
2.
‘Eiki ke ke tokoni au
‘I ho anga’ofa,
Pea u kalangaekina,
‘A e ‘Afiona.
3.
Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū
‘Oku mālie ai,
‘A e kakai loto mamahi
Pea angavaivai.
4.
Ko e kalofanga ia
Ki he halaia,
Ko e monu’ia’anga
Ki he mala’ia.
5.
‘Oku foa’i ‘e Sīsū
‘A e loto maka,
Pea fakaloto fo’ou
‘A e angahala.
6.
‘Oku ne motumotuhi
Hotau ngaahi ha’i
‘O ne taukapo’i atu
Hotau laumālie. *
